tasks.label: Stop NDAY_OM Backend
tasks.command: $conn = Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 8000 -State Listen -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if ($conn) { $procIds = $conn | Select-Object -ExpandProperty OwningProcess -Unique; foreach ($procId in $procIds) { Stop-Process -Id $procId -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }; Write-Host "Stopped backend process(es) on port 8000: $($procIds -join ', ')" } else { Write-Host "No backend process listening on port 8000." }
